duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain the integrated Medical strategy for Precision Oncology product area to support business growth.
Lead annual Medical Innovation and Ideation sessions; socialize key takeaways.
Track and provide regular status updates on objectives and key results (OKRs) linked to the integrated Medical strategy.
Facilitate evidence generation and Medical strategy meetings in collaboration with Medical and Commercial team leads.
Identify and communicate process/procedure gaps to Medical Strategy team lead; oversee related workstreams to fill these gaps.
Maintain regular attendance and compliance with company policies and procedures.
Provide onboarding support to new team members and personnel from other functions.
Engage in Medical Strategy team meetings and remain current on relevant business decisions.
Participate in Medical Development team meetings, clinical teams study review meetings, and product-specific core team meetings.
Identify and communicate need for external contractors to Medical Strategy team leadership when demands on team exceed available resources.
Provide inputs into long- and short-range plans, budgeting, and resource allocation.
Comply with the company's Quality Management System policies and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in a field related to the essential duties
